member.name: T:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenter
member.summary: SDK core used to initialize, start and control specific service.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenter.LogLevel
member.summary: This property controls the amount of logs emitted by the SDK.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenter.SetUserId(System.String)
member.summary: Set the custom user id.
member.param: Custom string to identify user. 256 characters or less.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenter.SdkVersion
member.summary: Get the current version of AppCenter SDK.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenter.IsEnabledAsync
member.summary: Check whether the SDK is enabled or not as a whole.
member.returns: A task with result being true if enabled, false if disabled.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenter.SetEnabledAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable or disable the SDK as a whole. Updating the state propagates the value to all services that have been started.
member.returns: A task to monitor the operation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenter.GetInstallIdAsync
member.summary: Get the unique installation identifier for this application installation on this device.
member.remarks: The identifier is lost if clearing application data or uninstalling application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenter.SetLogUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Change the base URL (scheme + authority + port only) used to communicate with the backend.
member.param: Base URL to use for server communication.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenter.Configured
member.summary: Check whether SDK has already been configured or not.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenter.Configure(System.String)
member.summary: Configure the SDK. This may be called only once per application process lifetime.
member.param: A unique and secret key used to identify the application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenter.Start(System.Type[])
member.summary: Start services. This may be called only once per service per application process lifetime.
member.param: List of services to use.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenter.Start(System.String,System.Type[])
member.summary: Initialize the SDK with the list of services to start. This may be called only once per application process lifetime.
member.param: A unique and secret key used to identify the application.
List of services to use.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenter.SetCustomProperties(Microsoft.AppCenter.CustomProperties)
member.summary: Set the custom properties.
member.param: Custom properties object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenterLog
member.summary: This class is used to log messages consistent with those emitted by the SDK. Note: To track events, use Analytics.TrackEvent.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenterLog.LogTag
member.summary: The log tag for this SDK. All logs emitted at the SDK level will contain this tag.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenterLog.Verbose(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Writes a log and an exception at the level. Note: To track events, use Analytics.TrackEvent.
member.param: Log tag.
Message.
Associated exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenterLog.Debug(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Writes a log and an exception at the level. Note: To track events, use Analytics.TrackEvent.
member.param: Log tag.
Message.
Associated exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenterLog.Info(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Writes a log and an exception at the level. Note: To track events, use Analytics.TrackEvent.
member.param: Log tag.
Message.
Associated exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenterLog.Warn(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Writes a log and an exception at the level. Note: To track events, use Analytics.TrackEvent.
member.param: Log tag.
Message.
Associated exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenterLog.Error(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Writes a log and an exception at the level. Note: To track events, use Analytics.TrackEvent.
member.param: Log tag.
Message.
Associated exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.AppCenterLog.Assert(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Writes a log and an exception at the level. Note: To track events, use Analytics.TrackEvent.
member.param: Log tag.
Message.
Associated exception.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device
member.summary: Device class to help retrieve device information.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.SdkName
member.summary: Gets the name of the SDK.
member.value: Name of the SDK. Consists of the name of the SDK and the platform, e.g. "mobilecenter.ios", "mobilecenter.android"

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.SdkVersion
member.summary: Gets the SDK version.
member.value: Version of the SDK in semver format, e.g. "1.2.0" or "0.12.3-alpha.1".

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.Model
member.summary: Gets the device model.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.OemName
member.summary: Gets the name of the manufacturer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.OsName
member.summary: Gets the name of the OS.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.OsVersion
member.summary: Gets the OS version.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.OsBuild
member.summary: Gets the OS build

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.OsApiLevel
member.summary: Gets the OS API level.
member.value: API level when applicable like in Android (example: 15).

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.Locale
member.summary: Gets the locale.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.TimeZoneOffset
member.summary: Gets the time zone offset.
member.value: The offset in minutes from UTC for the device time zone, including daylight savings time.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.ScreenSize
member.summary: Gets the size of the screen.
member.value: Screen size of the device in pixels (example: 640x480).

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.AppVersion
member.summary: Gets the application version.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.CarrierName
member.summary: Gets the name of the carrier.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.CarrierCountry
member.summary: Gets the carrier country.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.AppBuild
member.summary: Gets the app build.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Device.AppNamespace
member.summary: Gets the app namespace.
member.value: The bundle identifier, package identifier, or namespace, depending on what the individual platforms use, e.g.com.microsoft.example.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AppCenter.CustomProperties
member.summary: Custom properties builder. Collects multiple properties to send in one log.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.CustomProperties.Set(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Set the specified property value with the specified key. If the properties previously contained a property for the key, the old value is replaced.
member.param: Key with which the specified value is to be set.
Value to be set with the specified key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.CustomProperties.Set(System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Set the specified property value with the specified key. If the properties previously contained a property for the key, the old value is replaced.
member.param: Key with which the specified value is to be set.
Value to be set with the specified key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.CustomProperties.Set(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the specified property value with the specified key. If the properties previously contained a property for the key, the old value is replaced.
member.param: Key with which the specified value is to be set.
Value to be set with the specified key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.CustomProperties.Set(System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Set the specified property value with the specified key. If the properties previously contained a property for the key, the old value is replaced.
member.param: Key with which the specified value is to be set.
Value to be set with the specified key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.CustomProperties.Set(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Set the specified property value with the specified key. If the properties previously contained a property for the key, the old value is replaced.
member.param: Key with which the specified value is to be set.
Value to be set with the specified key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.CustomProperties.Set(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Set the specified property value with the specified key. If the properties previously contained a property for the key, the old value is replaced.
member.param: Key with which the specified value is to be set.
Value to be set with the specified key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.CustomProperties.Set(System.String,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Set the specified property value with the specified key. If the properties previously contained a property for the key, the old value is replaced.
member.param: Key with which the specified value is to be set.
Value to be set with the specified key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.CustomProperties.Set(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set the specified property value with the specified key. If the properties previously contained a property for the key, the old value is replaced.
member.param: Key with which the specified value is to be set.
Value to be set with the specified key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.CustomProperties.Clear(System.String)
member.summary: Clear the property for the specified key.
member.param: Key whose mapping is to be cleared.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AppCenter.LogLevel
member.summary: Log level threshold for logs emitted by the SDK.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AppCenter.LogLevel.Verbose
member.summary: SDK emits all possible level of logs.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AppCenter.LogLevel.Debug
member.summary: SDK emits debug, info, warn, error and assert logs.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AppCenter.LogLevel.Info
member.summary: SDK emits info, warn, error, and assert logs.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AppCenter.LogLevel.Warn
member.summary: SDK emits warn, error, and assert logs.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AppCenter.LogLevel.Error
member.summary: SDK error and assert logs.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AppCenter.LogLevel.Assert
member.summary: Only assert logs are emitted by SDK.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AppCenter.LogLevel.None
member.summary: No log is emitted by SDK.
